News

Sep 2024

Hengrui Zhang received an award from the UCL Library Open Science Community as a runner-up in the UCL Open Science and Scholarship Award, under the category of Academic staff/PhD students - Open source software/analysis tools.

Sep 2024

Zhijun Guo, Joseph Farrington and Ken Li published “Large Language Models for Mental Health Applications - A Systematic Review” in JMIR Mental Health.

Aug 2024

Zhijun Guo and Ken Li published “Evaluating the Feasibility and Acceptability of a GPT-Based Chatbot for Depression Screening - A Mixed-Methods Study” in Artificial Intelligence in Healthcare.

July 2024

Joe Farrington attended 50th annual meeting of the EURO Working Group on Operational Research Applied to Health Services. Oral - Charting the Pareto frontier - Multi-objective optimization for platelet inventory management using neuroevolution.

June 2024

Joe Farrington’s AI software won the Healthcare Partnership of the Year category at the London Higher Awards 2024.

May 2024

Joe Farrington attended UKRI AI CDTs in Healthcare Conference. Poster - Many happy returns - a machine learning-based allocation policy to support platelet waste reduction in hospital blood banks.

May 2024

Chengzhe Piao attended UKRI AI CDTs in Healthcare Conference. Poster - Privacy Preserved Blood Glucose Level Prediction by Federated Learning.

Feb 2024

Chengzhe Piao attended ATTD’24. Poster - Personalized Blood Glucose Level Prediction Leveraging Population Features by Decentralized Federated Learning.

Nov 2023

Joseph Farrington and Ken Li published “Machine learning in transfusion medicine - A scoping review” in Transfusion.

Oct 2023

Welcome Hengrui Zhang to join the group as a new PhD student!

Oct 2023

Taiyu Zhu and Ken Li published “Offline Deep Reinforcement Learning and Off-Policy Evaluation for Personalized Basal Insulin Control in Type 1 Diabetes” in IEEE Journal of Biomedical and Health Informatics.

Oct 2023

Joe Farrington attended British Blood Transfusion Society Conference. Poster - Many happy returns, a machine learning-based allocation policy to support platelet waste reduction in hospital blood banks.

Sep 2023

Zhiqiang Huo and Ken Li published “Distribution and trajectory of vital signs from high-frequency continuous monitoring during pediatric critical care transport” in Intensive Care Med. Paediatr. Neonatal.

July 2023

Welcome Nicola Oginni to join the group for a summer internship.

July 2023

Joe Farrington attended INFORMS Healthcare Conference. Oral - Going faster to see further, GPU-accelerated value iteration and simulation for blood product inventory management.

July 2023

Joe Farrington attended 49th annual meeting of the EURO Working Group on Operational Research Applied to Health Services. Oral - Reducing platelet wastage with a machine learning-based allocation policy.

May 2023

Joe Farrington attended UKRI AI CDTs in Healthcare Conference. Oral - Going faster to see further, GPU-accelerated value iteration and simulation for blood inventory management using JAX.

March 2023

Ken Li published “Classification of Lapses in Smokers Attempting to Stop, A Supervised Machine Learning Approach Using Data From a Popular Smoking Cessation Smartphone App” in Nicotine & Tobacco Research.

Feb 2023

Chengzhe Piao attended ATTD’23. Poster - Blood glucose level prediction, an explainable graph-based method.

Feb 2023

Welcome Zhijun Guo to join the group as a new PhD student!

Sep 2022

Joe Farrington attended BioMedEng Conference Sep. Poster - Deep reinforcement learning for platelet inventory management.

Sep 2022

Chengzhe Piao attended BioMedEng Conference Sep. Oral - Blood glucose level prediction for type 1 diabetes via Federated Learning.

July 2022

Joe Farrington attended 48th annual meeting of the EURO Working Group on Operational Research Applied to Health Services. Oral and poster - Deep reinforcement learning for platelet inventory management.

June 2022

Joe Farrington attended Early Career Researchers in Mathematics Conference. Oral - Deep reinforcement learning for platelet inventory management.

May 2022

Joe Farrington attended UKRI AI CDTs in Healthcare Conference. Oral and poster - Deep reinforcement learning for platelet inventory management.
